raytracer.primitives
Interface Intersectable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Box, BoxedGroup, Cone, Cylinder, Sphere
public interface Intersectable

Interface for all intersectable objects.

Author:
(c) 2009-11 Roland Fraedrich

Method Summary
 void getMinMaxXYZ(Vector3d min, Vector3d max)
          Gives the minimal and maximum extent of the object in x-, y- and z-direction.
 Intersection intersect(Ray r)
          Returns the closest intersection of the ray and the object.
 

Method Detail

intersect

Intersection intersect(Ray r)
Returns the closest intersection of the ray and the object.

Parameters:
r - The ray for which to find an intersection.
Returns:
Intersection of the ray and the object. null if no intersection exists.

getMinMaxXYZ

void getMinMaxXYZ(Vector3d min,
                  Vector3d max)
Gives the minimal and maximum extent of the object in x-, y- and z-direction. Results is written to the given parameters.

Parameters:
min - Vector to write the minimum extent to.
max - Vector to write the maximal extent to.
